org.semver.enforcer
Class RequireBackwardCompatibility

java.lang.Object
  org.semver.enforcer.AbstractEnforcerRule
      org.semver.enforcer.RequireBackwardCompatibility
All Implemented Interfaces:
org.apache.maven.enforcer.rule.api.EnforcerRule
public final class RequireBackwardCompatibility
extends AbstractEnforcerRule

Checks Version for current Artifact compared to a previous Artifact.
Fails if current version is not backward compatible with previous one. Delta.CompatibilityType level can be specified.
